Mercenarys

Guild Information
My blood to your blood, your blood to mine. Our unity over all, until the end of time. My life for the family, my sword for the victory. HAIL to the Mercs, forever and in eternity!

The guild was founded on Antica on Feb 18 2002.
It is currently active, but either has no leader, too few vice leaders, or less than 5 accounts with premium status in the ranks held by leader and vice leaders.
Guild is opened for applications.
It will be disbanded on Feb 07 2023 if there are still less than four vice leaders or an insufficient amount of premium accounts in the leading ranks by then.
The official homepage is at www.mercenarys.net.
Their home on Antica is Mercenary Tower. The rent is paid until Jan 28 2023.
